index.welcome: Welcome to our digital Loan Butler!
index.welcomeSubtext: We have incorporated speed, excellence, and a focus on customer relationships into our simple and easy-to-use application.
index.quickSubtext: Our exclusive online loan technology gives you access to apply for home financing with a few simple clicks and keeps you in the loop along the way.
index.convenientSubtext: Initiate a credit check, review your scores, digitally verify your employment information, and seamlessly upload documents from any computer or mobile device.
index.secureSubtext: Our custom platform is encrypted, certified, and secure â€“ which means your important information is safe with us!
